message.body: Do we have gardening gloves to wear while moving things to make carrying stuff easier?
Let's discuss when I get home.
I put Delilah's water dish in the dishwasher and forgot to give her fresh water. Please let me know you got this and took care of it
Ill do it when I go downstairs!
Don't know your plans but I am on the t at Brookline hills on my way home.

She could also take now: • living room end table/bookstand next to loveseat (at living rm/hallway intersection; I have a replacement handy) • more blue or dark green or white towels (some in den closet) • starter food or favorites, including cold in a cooler • a bath mat or 2 (incl dark green that's same fabric as towels) • indoor doormat • all kinds of paper & plastic goods from basement--plus trash bags--can go into another trash bag • bucket, plastic hand-wash/multipurpose basin, a toolbox from basement • a multi-tool or 2
Good luck w truck and loading. Stay hydrated & take at Least 40 oz. non- coffee liquids each when u leave the house
It's no big deal, you had butt dialed me
Stopped for coffee. Rest area 1 mile north of where Garden State meets tpk. How are you doing?
